summary: Ever feel a bit frustrated by the way that you keep having to recharge the Daedric artifacts (and they do seem to take alot of soul gems to recharge). Well this mod changes that, it makes it so that you never have to recharge the Daedric Artifacts. It does not, however, change any of the stats to these weapons.
descriptionHtml:
What is this Mod?
===============
-Ever feel a bit frustrated by the way that you keep having to recharge the Daedric artifacts (and they do seem to take alot of soul gems to recharge). Well this mod changes that, it makes it so that you never have to recharge the Daedric Artifacts. It does not, however, change any of the stats to these weapons.

What Daedric Artifacts Does This Mod Cover?
=====================================
-Dawnbreaker
-Mace of Molag Bal
-Rueful Axe
-Sanguine Rose
-Staff of Corruption
-Volendrung
-Wabbajack

Why This Mod?
=============
I know that there are other mods out there that make the Daedric Artifacts not have to be recharged, but they all seem to change other things about them along with it. This mod only fixes the recharge factor.





Notes:
=====
-I would like to hear imput about this, so if you have a question or comment about this mod, feel free to post it.
-Please report any bugs or conflicts with other mods
-Don\'t forget to rate if you like this mod
-This mod is on Steam as well
-Also available for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3626/?]Skyrim Special Edition
[/url]


Other Mods:
==========
-Fea Rana Follower
-Vares Rarem Follower
-Istalindir Follower
-The Ilfirin Sgiathatch
author: Ghostrunner24
